Patient Resources

Comprehensive services for your healthcare needs

New Patient Forms Insurance Information healow Patient Portal Service

Adult Medicine

Our practice focuses on comprehensive healthcare for patients 21 and older. This approach allows Dr. Khatib to establish lasting connections with each patient and function as your dedicated healthcare partner for all medical needs.

Our Adult Medicine Services Include:

Routine Care

Annual physical examinations and preventive screenings

Acute Care

Treatment of illnesses, injuries, and urgent health concerns

Ongoing Management

Continuous care for chronic conditions and overall wellness

See All Services
  • Annual physical examinations
  • Treatment of acute illnesses and injuries
  • Management of chronic conditions
  • Preventive care and screenings
  • Health maintenance and wellness care
  • Referrals to specialists when needed
  • Coordination of care with other healthcare providers

Preventive Care

We believe that preventing illness is more effective than treating it. Our preventive care approach helps you maintain optimal health and identify potential issues early when they're most responsive to treatment.

Screenings & Assessments

Age-appropriate screenings and comprehensive health risk assessments

Immunizations

Vaccinations for important and recommended diseases

Lifestyle Guidance

Counseling on nutrition, exercise, and healthy habits

Learn About All Preventive Services
  • Annual wellness visits
  • Health risk assessments
  • Age-appropriate screenings
  • Important recommended immunizations and vaccinations
  • Lifestyle and nutrition counseling
  • Smoking cessation support
  • Weight management guidance

Chronic Disease Management

Managing a chronic condition presents unique challenges. We offer comprehensive support to help you effectively address your condition and enhance your quality of life.

Cardiovascular Conditions

Hypertension, heart disease, and high cholesterol management

Metabolic Disorders

Diabetes, thyroid disorders, and other metabolic conditions

Respiratory Conditions

Asthma, COPD, and other chronic respiratory issues

Neurological Issues

Migraine management and other neurological conditions

Our Management Approach:

We develop customized treatment plans tailored to your specific condition, health history, and lifestyle. Our boutique practice model enables Dr. Khatib to provide detailed monitoring, careful medication management, and coordinated specialist care while maintaining consistent oversight of your health journey. Unlike high-volume clinics, we dedicate the necessary time and attention for complex conditions.

New Patient Information

Everything you need to prepare for your first visit

New Patient Forms

Please complete these fillable PDF forms before your first appointment to save time during your visit. Must be 21 years or older to become a patient.

How to complete: You can either print these forms and fill them out by hand, or download and complete them digitally using Adobe Acrobat Reader or another PDF application that supports fillable forms.

  • Financial Policy
  • Records Request Form
  • Office Policies

Appointment Preparation

How to prepare for your first visit with Dr. Khatib:

  • Bring your completed forms (or arrive 15 minutes early to complete them)
  • Bring your insurance card and photo ID
  • Bring a list of current medications including dosages
  • Bring any relevant medical records or test results
  • Prepare a list of questions you may have for the doctor

Insurance Information

Understanding your coverage and financial options

Khatib Family Practice accepts most major insurance plans. If you have specific questions about your coverage, please contact our office at (928) 763-9009 for assistance.

Insurance Plans We Accept

We work with a wide range of insurance providers to ensure accessible care for our patients:

Medicare and Medicare Advantage
Blue Cross Blue Shield
Aetna
Cigna
UnitedHealthcare
Humana
Tricare

Self-Pay Options

We offer reasonable self-pay rates for patients without insurance coverage. Our team is committed to making healthcare accessible and will work with you to find payment solutions that fit your budget.

Call us at (928) 763-9009 for more information about our self-pay options.

Contact Us About Insurance

Insurance FAQs

Answers to common questions about insurance coverage at our practice:

  • We verify your insurance benefits before your appointment
  • Co-payments are collected at the time of service
  • Please bring your insurance card to every visit
  • We'll help you understand your coverage and benefits
  • Our staff can assist with filing claims and resolving billing issues
Billing Questions

Need any of our services?

Our team is ready to help with all your family's healthcare needs.
